column4: i just received 20 or so spam messages to my inbox in gmail. that's a bit strange no ? Did that happen to anyone else ?
how do 20 spam messages beat the gmail filter all of a sudden ?
i think i might have given my email to someone who used it maliciously ...
how would they beat the filter on Goolge ?
By having in the headers details which match some of your contacts or something that google trusts
